Desc.entry: Offers external supervision to workers offering advice and support to children and young people. These workers may or may not have a counselling background and may work in any context, eg health, education, social areas, voluntary or support groups. This service is free where funding is available to small voluntary organisations or to individuals. The supervision is distinct from line management and aims to provide ethical and professional boundaries and ways of reducing stress for the workers.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: By arrangement, either at supervisee's workplace or at different supervisor's practice addresses
